MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Mitosis | d: Respiration

MCQ: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: Cell division | c: Photosynthesis | d: Genetic mutation

MCQ: What is the study of life at the molecular level called?
Choices: a: Anatomy | b: Physiology | c: Molecular biology | d: Ecology

MCQ: When did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 2 million years ago | b: 3.7 billion years ago | c: 500 million years ago | d: 10,000 years ago
